sub_title: Regional Customer Service Manager | Nordics, Benelux & Poland
summary:
Customer Service Manager with experience in leading international teams across different geographies such as Europe and APAC. Working as Project Manager and handling several stakeholders internal and external.

Experience in building in house and outsourced teams in different regions.
Experience in standardisation of processes, training, implementing new solutions and improving ways or working across different markets. Handling internal and external stakeholders across different geographies.
